description.p: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature’s power.
For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon’s damage die becomes a d8.
The weapon also becomes magical, if it isn’t already. The spell ends if you cast it again or if you let go of the weapon. PHB p275
MANAGE > ATTACKS > ABILITY > WISDOM (or your spellcasting ability)

setters.set: shillelagh, club, druid, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature’s power.
For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon’s damage die becomes a d8.
The weapon also becomes magical, if it isn’t already. The spell ends if you cast it again or if you let go of the weapon. PHB p275
MANAGE > ATTACKS > ABILITY > WISDOM (or your spellcasting ability)

setters.set: shillelagh, quarterstaff, druid, custom, lemoncat, aaa

element.name: Lightning Launcher (DEX/INT)
element.description: A gemlike node appears on one of your armored fists or on the chest. It counts as a simple ranged weapon, with a normal range of 90 feet and a long range of 300 feet, and it deals 1d6 lightning damage on a hit. Once on each of your turns when you hit a creature with it, you can deal an extra 1d6 lightning damage to that target.

setters.set: lightning, launcher, artificer, armorer, custom, lemoncat, aaa

element.name: Psychic Blade (STR/DEX Action)
element.description: PSYCHIC BLADES 3rd-level Rogue Soulknife feature - You can manifest your psionic power as shimmering blades of psychic energy. Whenever you take the Attack action, you can manifest a psychic blade from your free hand and make the attack with that blade. This magic blade is a simple melee weapon with the finesse and thrown properties. It has a normal range of 60 feet and no long range, and on a hit, it deals psychic damage equal to 1d6 plus the ability modifier you used for the attack roll. The blade vanishes immediately after it hits or misses its target, and it leaves no mark on its target if it deals damage. - After you attack with the blade, you can make a melee or ranged attack with a second psychic blade as a bonus action on the same turn, provided your other hand is free to create it. The damage die of this bonus attack is 1d4, instead of 1d6.

setters.set: psychic, psionic, soul, thrown, finesse, custom, lemoncat, aaa

element.name: Psychic Blade (STR/DEX Bonus Action)
element.description: PSYCHIC BLADES 3rd-level Rogue Soulknife feature - You can manifest your psionic power as shimmering blades of psychic energy. Whenever you take the Attack action, you can manifest a psychic blade from your free hand and make the attack with that blade. This magic blade is a simple melee weapon with the finesse and thrown properties. It has a normal range of 60 feet and no long range, and on a hit, it deals psychic damage equal to 1d6 plus the ability modifier you used for the attack roll. The blade vanishes immediately after it hits or misses its target, and it leaves no mark on its target if it deals damage. - After you attack with the blade, you can make a melee or ranged attack with a second psychic blade as a bonus action on the same turn, provided your other hand is free to create it. The damage die of this bonus attack is 1d4, instead of 1d6.

setters.set: psychic, psionic, soul, thrown, finesse, custom, lemoncat, aaa

element.name: Unarmed Strike
element.description: A punch, kick, elbow, headbutt, or other physical attack using the body.

setters.set: unarmed, strike, melee, monk, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo focuses magic for casters.
Spellcasting Focus. The tattoo acts as a spellcasting focus, much like a wand, staff, totem, rod, amulet, or other such object but is usable by any class capable of using magic.

ul.li: +0 bonus to spell attack rolls.
+0 bonus to spell DCs.

description.p: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo focuses magic for casters.
Spellcasting Focus. The tattoo acts as a spellcasting focus, much like a wand, staff, totem, rod, amulet, or other such object but is usable by any class capable of using magic.

ul.li: +1 bonus to spell attack rolls.
+1 bonus to spell DCs.

description.p: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo focuses magic for casters.
Spellcasting Focus. The tattoo acts as a spellcasting focus, much like a wand, staff, totem, rod, amulet, or other such object but is usable by any class capable of using magic.

ul.li: +2 bonus to spell attack rolls.
+2 bonus to spell DCs.

setters.set: tattoo, cast, spell, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo focuses magic for casters.
Spellcasting Focus. The tattoo acts as a spellcasting focus, much like a wand, staff, totem, rod, amulet, or other such object but is usable by any class capable of using magic.

ul.li: +3 bonus to spell attack rolls.
+3 bonus to spell DCs.

setters.set: tattoo, cast, spell, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo allows a creature to cast the Goodberry spell 1/day.

Goodberry Spell. When cupping your hand and speaking the command word, the Goodberry spell is cast. The tattoo can be triggered once per day, and regains it's ability at dawn. The berries produced are small, smooth, multicolored, and sweet.

setters.set: tattoo, cast, spell, goodberry, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo grants the creature darkvision out to 60ft.
Darkvision. You gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet.
Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo grants the creature Blindsight out to 60ft.
Blindsight. You gain blindsight with a range of 60 feet.
While wearing this ring you can cast the Prestidigitation cantrip at will.
While wearing this ring you can cast the Thaumaturgy cantrip at will.
While wearing this ring you can cast the Druidcraft cantrip at will.
While wearing this ring you can cast the Light cantrip at will.
While wearing this ring you can cast the Shape Water cantrip at will.
This extremely ornate metal bracelet appears to be finely engraved with intricate depictions of birds.
When a command word is spoken by the wearer, the bracelet magically disassembles into a set of lock picking tools that emit a dim red light within a radius of 5 feet.
When the command word is spoken again, the bracelet magically reassembles itself, provided that all of its parts are undamaged and within 5ft of each other. The dim red light also fades.

setters.set: bracelet, thieves, thief, lock, pick, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This ivory bracelet is engraved with simplistic icons of the elements: acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder.
When the wearer casts a spell that does elemental damage of a type listed above, the caster can expend one charge to alter that damage to that of a different element of a type listed above.
For example if the fireball spell were cast, one charge could be expended by the caster to change the damage type from fire to acid.
The bracelet can hold up to 5 charges and regains 1 charge at dawn.

setters.set: bracelet, element, damage, spell, cast, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This verawood bracelet is inlaid with snakewood in a striped pattern, and is completely smooth to the touch.
When the wearer casts the Barkskin spell on a creature or themselves, the caster can apply the following optional modifiers:

ul.li: Concentration is not needed to maintain the spell.
The AC cannot be less than 19, but the Duration is reduced to 5 minutes.
If Barkskin is active on a creature, you can expend a level 1 spell slot to recast it on that creature.

setters.set: bracelet, barkskin, spell, cast, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This black leather riding crop sparkles galantly with blue twinkling dim light to a radius of 5ft.
When the holder casts the Find Steed spell, they can do so with following modifications:

ul.li: The casting time becomes 1 minute.
Each summoned steed gains temporary HP equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
Each summoned steed is in excellent health, and is summoned with maximum possible HP based on their hit dice.
At higher levels, you can summon 1 additional steed for each additional level of spell slot.
With your DM's permission, when you touch a summoned steed with the riding crop, you can alter it's form to a different steed creature.

setters.set: riding, crop, find, steed, spell, cast, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This pair of dowsing rods is made of ashwood with silver handles.
When the holder casts the Find Traps spell, they can do so with following modifications:

ul.li: You learn the location of all traps within range.
You learn the damage type(s) inflicted by each trap. Example: piercing, fire, etc.

setters.set: dowsing, rod, find, trap, spell, cast, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This 2 inch diameter bell has no clapper, and is made of oakwood.
When the holder casts the Knock spell, they can do so with following modifications:

ul.li: No knocking sound emanates from the targeted object at all.
If the targeted object has multiple locks, up to three of them are unlocked instead of just one.

setters.set: knock, bell, spell, cast, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This choker is made of finely woven spider silk with a spiderweb embroidered on the front.
When the wearer casts the Web spell, they can do so with up to two of the following modifications:

ul.li: The webs you cast do not require concentration to maintain, and their duration is reduced to 2 minutes.
The webs you cast are not flammable, and do not burn at all.
The webs you cast can be any color you choose.
The webs you cast have very fine strands. For a creature to sense your web, it must first pass a perception check equal to your spellcasting DC. If it becomes trapped in your web, it senses it.

setters.set: spider, web, choker, spell, cast, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This ornate brass brazier is finely engraved with intricate depictions of phoenixes.

When a command word is spoken and the lid lifted, a single charge is expended. Charcoal, incense, and herbs with a combined value of 10gp are magically produced in the brazier. If these components are removed from the brazier they instantly dissapear.
The brass brazier regains 1d4 charges at dawn, to a maximum of 5 charges.
Any familiar summoned from this brazier with the Find Familiar spell gains an additional 5 temporary HP.

setters.set: brass, brazier, phoenix, familiar, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While wearing this ring you gain the following modifications to your Hexblood traits and features.

ul.li: Eerie Tokens - The maximum number of Eerie Tokens you can create now equals your Proficiency Bonus.
Telepathic Messages - These can now be sent through one, some, or all of your Eerie Tokens at the same time.
Remote Viewing - The Eerie Token is not destroyed at the end of the trance unless you choose it to be.
Remote Viewing - You can enter your trance a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

setters.set: hexblood, eerie, token, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While wearing this amulet you gain the following modifications to your Kenku traits and features.

ul.li: Tool Proficiency - You gain proficiency with Calligraphers Supplies and Forgery Tools if you do not already have them.
Languages - Your speech is no longer restricted by your Mimicry trait. You can speak naturally with your own voice if you choose to.

setters.set: kenku, blessing, amulet, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: When struck three times on a hard suface a charge is expended, and the foot long silver femur (thigh) bone magically forms around it a large amount of freshly roasted, juicy red beast meat that is sufficient to sustain a medium sized creature for one full day. This item has 3 charges and regains all of its charges at dawn.

setters.set: meat, bone, plenty, food, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This cornocopia is made of woven reeds and silver thread, and is about the size of a chicken. When upturned and a command word is spoken, a charge is expended and the cornocopia produces enough fresh fruit, vegetables, seeds, grains, and other vegan-safe produce to feed 5 medium sized creatures for one day. The cornocopia regains 1d4 charges at dawn.
Each time a charge is spent, roll a d20. On a natural 20 the cornocopia also produces a jar of fresh local honey.

setters.set: cornocopia, plenty, food, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This wooden butter churn is made of ash wood and silver banding, and is about the size of a bucket. When a command word is spoken and the churn is then opened, a charge is expended and the curn produces either two dozen fresh chicken eggs, four pounds of fresh goat butter, four gallons of fresh cool goat milk, four gallons of fresh cool goat cream, or four pounds of fresh fish (user's choice). The churn regains 1d4 charges at dawn.
Each time a charge is spent, roll a d20. On a natural 20 the churn instead produces all of the listed produce.
After one hour, any food within the churn magically disappears as it cleans itself.

setters.set: churn, plenty, food, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This 4 inch diameter silver hand bell, can be rung loudly once per day to cast the spell Create Food and Water. When rung, the chime can be heard within a range of 100ft.
When the bell is rung, roll a d20. On a natural 20 the bell casts the spell 10 times in a row, and cannot be prevented from doing so.

setters.set: supper, bell, food, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This bag has an interior space considerably larger than its outside dimensions, roughly 10 cubic feet. The bag can hold up to a value of 50,000 gold coins, or the equivalent in other units or currency. The bag weighs 1 pound, regardless of its contents. Retrieving any amount of coins from the bag requires an action.
If an attempt to overload the purse is made, any excess currency is harmlessly rejected by the purse.

If the bag is pierced or torn from the outside, it ruptures and is destroyed, and its contents are expelled in the nearest unoccupied space. If the bag is turned inside out, its contents spill forth, unharmed, but the purse must be put right before it can be used again.
Only minted currency (coins or notes) can be put into the purse, as it harmlessly rejects all other items, objects, creatures, and such like.
The magic of the purse makes it difficult to steal, granting you advantage on Perception checks against any Slight of Hand checks made to steal it.

setters.set: purse, holding, money, coins, currency, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While wearing this choker out of water, you can speak its command word as an action to create a bubble of perpetually fresh sea water around your head and or gills. It allows you to breathe water normally while out of water. This bubble stays with you until you speak the command word again, the choker is removed, or you are no longer out of the water.
This item only activates on creatures capable of breathing water through a racial trait. It does not prevent status effects such as poison or disease from gas or miasma.

setters.set: choker, land, breath, water, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: Any ammunition (normal or magically created by the weapon such as Repeating Shot) that the attuned wearer fires becomes venomous for the next minute, and inflicts an additional 1d6 poison damage. A creature hit by this ammunition becomes poisoned if it fails a DC13 Constitution saving throw. The saving throw can be repeated once at the end of each of the creature's turns.

setters.set: venom, poison, damage, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While wearing this band, you have the Call to the Wave Racial Feature from the Water Genasi. (Princes of the Apocalypse)

Call to the Wave.You know the Shape Water cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the Create or Destroy Water spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

setters.set: band, call, wave, grung, custom, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While wearing this band, you have the Call to the Wave Racial Feature from the Water Genasi (Princes of the Apocalypse).

Call to the Wave.You know the Shape Water cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the Create or Destroy Water spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

This simple screwdriver can transform into a variety of tools; as an action, you can touch the item and transform it into any type of artisan’s tool of your choice (see the "Equipment" chapter in the Player’s Handbook for a list of artisan’s tools). Whatever form the tool takes, you are proficient with it.
While holding this tool, you gain a +0 bonus to the spell attack rolls and the saving throw DCs of your artificer spells.

As an action, you can focus on the tool to channel your creative forces. Choose a cantrip that you don’t know from any class list. For 8 hours, you can cast that cantrip, and it counts as an artificer cantrip for you. Once this property is used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

This item only works for Druids Regardless of your physical form (Humanoid, Wild Shape, Elemental, Gaseous), while you are in possession of this item, are wearing no armor, and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

This item only works for Druids Regardless of your physical form (Humanoid, Wild Shape, Elemental, Gaseous), while you are in possession of this item, you are wearing no armor, and not wielding a shield, your AC equals {{ac:unarmored defense monk}}.

setters.set: druid, ac, defense, armor, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: This item only works for Druids Regardless of your physical form (Humanoid, Wild Shape, Elemental, Gaseous), while you are in possession of this item, you have the magical ability to communicate mentally with any number of willing creatures you can see within 30 feet of you. A contacted creature doesn’t need to share a language with you, but it must be able to understand at least one language. Your telepathic link to a creature is broken if you and the creature move more than 30 feet apart, if either of you is incapacitated, or if either of you mentally breaks the contact (no action required).

This item only works for Druids Regardless of your physical form (Humanoid, Wild Shape, Elemental, Gaseous), while you are in possession of this item, you have the magical ability to communicate mentally with any number of willing creatures you can see within 30 feet of you. A contacted creature doesn’t need to share a language with you, but it must be able to understand at least one language. Your telepathic link to a creature is broken if you and the creature move more than 30 feet apart, if either of you is incapacitated, or if either of you mentally breaks the contact (no action required).

setters.set: druid, telepathy, talk, chat, message, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While this book is in your posession, you gain a +0 bonus spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of all of your spells, not just your Warlock spells.
In addition, you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the book. You can’t use this property again until you finish a long rest.

setters.set: warlock, book, tome, grimoire, shadows, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While this book is in your posession, you gain a +1 bonus spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of all of your spells, not just your Warlock spells.
In addition, you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the book. You can’t use this property again until you finish a long rest.

setters.set: warlock, book, tome, grimoire, shadows, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While this book is in your posession, you gain a +2 bonus spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of all of your spells, not just your Warlock spells.
In addition, you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the book. You can’t use this property again until you finish a long rest.

setters.set: warlock, book, tome, grimoire, shadows, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: While this book is in your posession, you gain a +3 bonus spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of all of your spells, not just your Warlock spells.
In addition, you can regain one warlock spell slot as an action while holding the book. You can’t use this property again until you finish a long rest.

setters.set: warlock, book, tome, grimoire, shadows, lemoncat, aaa

description.p: When you strike the ground using this magic weapon, all vermin within a 30ft radius sphere are Stunned until the start of your next turn.
Speaking a command word to activate or deactivate this feature, this magic weapon absorbs natural light within a 10ft sphere. Dim light becomes Darkness. Day light becomes Dim light.
Once per day while wielding this magic weapon, you can give yourself advantage on a single attack against a creature wearing metal armor.
You have advantage on Survival Checks to track the most recent creature you successfully hit with this magic weapon, provided that it has at least one hit point.
While this magic weapon is in your possession, all rain and hail within a 5ft radius sphere is deflected away from you, keeping you dry. This property does not function when you are underwater.

Once per day, you can speak a command word to transform this magic weapon into a plushie (small stuffed animal toy) for 1 hour. You can end the effect early by speaking the command word again. This effect is polymorphic transformation, not an illusion.

This magic weapon is unable to deal lethal damage under any circumstances. If a creature (as a direct result of being struck by this weapon or its ammunition) is forced to make a Death Saving Throw, that creature immediately Stablizes.
While wielding this magic weapon, the Drunk Condition is suppressed (if the wielder so chooses).
While wielding this magic weapon, a wooden mask (of the wielder's preferred design) magically appears on their face and cannot be removed.

This magic weapon is enhanced with a beautiful, strong glass coating. If a light emitting spell is cast on it, all ranges of that light spell are doubled. For Example, if the Light cantrip is cast on this magic weapon, the brightness ranges are 40 bright/40 dim instead of the usual 20/20.
This magic weapon never gets dirty.
This magic weapon magically teleports to your free hand if available, and if it is within 20 feet of you when you roll initiative.
This magic armor is made of Snakewood; an extremely hard wearing and tough wood, instead of metal.

setters.set: druid, wood, armor, lemoncat, aaa, custom

description.p: While wearing this magic armor your body temperature remains comfortable no matter the environmental temperature. It does not prevent damage or other effects.

You can sleep normally while wearing this magic armor, without suffering exhaustion. This property functions for a consecutive number of long rests equal to your proficiency bonus. Then the armor must be removed for a full night to restore its functionality.
Once per day while wearing this magic armor, you can grant yourself temporary HP equal to your proficiency bonus.
Once per day while wearing this magic armor, you can cast the Find Steed spell.
The coloring of this magic armor constantly shifts to match its environment, granting you advantage on Hide checks.

While wearing this magic armor you can vaguely sense the contents of any grave, burial site, or place of internment, within 10ft. For example, you would know a coffin contains "jewelry, a weapon, and a skeleton," but not "2 gold rings, a magic longsword, and a Lich Warrior."

setters.set: grave, undead, sense, armor, lemoncat, aaa, custom

description.p: While wearing this magic armor, everything you eat or drink tastes incredibly delicious. This armor smells slightly of fresh baked bread.

Once per day while wearing this magic armor, you can activate its feature as an Action. The feature lasts for 1 minute. Up to 5 creatures who have touched this armor within the last day, magically know your exact location, provided that they are on the same plane of existance.

setters.set: locat, sense, armor, lemoncat, aaa, custom

description.p: While wearing this magic armor, you can use a reaction to harmlessly store or retrieve 1 pet of Small or Tiny size within an pocket dimension. While the creature or construct pet is within this pocket dimension it rests peacefully, and does not change HP. All effects on the pet are effectively suspended until it emerges again.
While wearing this magic armor, you can cast the Feather Fall spell at will on yourself only.

setters.set: spell, fall, armor, lemoncat, aaa, custom

description.p: This magic armor has illusory insects crawling all over it constantly, granting the wearer a +2 bonus to Intimidation Checks.

setters.set: intimidat, skill, check, armor, lemoncat, aaa, custom
